title: anyone elses client get fullscreen this patch
body: i cant change it, before the patch it was half screen as normal but today it just got full screen and it annoying

replies.body:
You should be able to change your resolution in-game through the video screen and set it to windowed.  If it changed abruptly, though, then it's possible that your config settings may have corrupted.  I suggest a config reset just in case.

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings.

Let me know if that helps!
